verses.roman:
gaccha jānīhi tad-vṛttam
adhunā sādhv asādhu vā
vijñāya tad vidhāsyāmo
yathā śaṁ suhṛdāṁ bhavet

synonyms: gaccha—go; jānīhi—learn; tat—his (Dhṛtarāṣṭra's); vṛttam—activity; adhunā—at present; sādhu—good; asādhu—evil; vā—or; vijñāya—knowing; tat—that; vidhāsyāmaḥ—We will arrange; yathā—so that; śam—the benefit; suhṛdām—of Our dear ones; bhavet—will be.
translation: Go and see whether Dhṛtarāṣṭra is acting properly or not. When We find out, We will make the necessary arrangements to help Our dear friends.
